question:
The rise of convenience foods has helped people
keep up with the speed 
of the modern life style. what are the advantages of this trend? do the 
advantages outweigh the disadvantages?
text: Over the last few years, The usage of Preprocessed items has increased especially among the urban population. They are used mainly because the time taken to prepare them is less and the shelf life is also more. Others prefer not to use them because they are concerned about the chemicals which are used to preserve them. They in turn have harmful effects on the body. In the below section I will discuss the advantages and disadvantages of using canned meals.

To begin with, one of the advantages of using canned items is they have a long shelf life. For example, During the recent covid pandemic  individuals who were at higher risk used Tin items. The advantage of this was they travelled less frequent to the Supermarket, Which is considered a hotspot for the virus. Furthermore, The urban population which is super busy with their hectic schedule prefer using precooked meals because it takes less time to prepare.
